...or shaded or gray or sophisticated about it? What if it's a secular eschaton? 

But, then, what if I drank some warm milk with honey and went to bed?

... What if the endgame, here, is the implementation of the rough plan of the USSR, to which @SebGorka referred in an interview on Trump's meeting with Putin, to "turn this country into a sheet of glass" (may be a mild paraphrase)?

What if there's nothing nuanced...

... had to either be executed or shut their mouths? Because Helter Skelter took on a broader scope and a grander sweep when Alinskybots like Hillary, Bill, and the rest of their Manchurian Veteran and Community Organizer comrades were infected by the nihilistic fervor of it?...

...in power indefinitely))?

What if that's what all the weapons they were stockpiling, when Betty van Patter happened upon their financial irregularities related thereto, were for? For that particular revolution? What if that's part of why @horowitz39 and his friends...

(Manson had a racist streak a mile wide. He honed it to a fine cutting edge while partying in the Hollywood Hills with  limousine leftist Democrats like Terry Melcher, the Beach Boys, etc. He assumed, like LBJ, that his "racial uplift program" would leave him ...

Eldridge Cleaver? What if Huey and Eldridge, cokeheads that they were at the time, bought right into the idea of total race war for total race war's sake (ditching the step wherein Charlie and the Family emerge from Death Valley and rule the world...
